A SCHOOL BUS makes its way down the street. Singing can b heard from the kids inside. Pan up to reveal “Frighton Elementary” on the side of the bus.

(singing) The neck bone’s connected to the: head bone. The head bone’s connected to the: horn bone. The horn bone’s right above the...wing bones. (laughing) The bus pulls into a parking lot. (breathing fire)

GRAVES (CONT’D) (realizing - this isn’t the first time...) Oooh, Mike Wazowski. The bus doors open revealing a very tiny, 8-year-old Mike Wazowski, smiling.

Pairing up with Claire? Great choice, she’s a good egg. Russell. Mike. Wazowski? We carpool. We're cousins.

Well, Michael, it looks like it’s you and me again.
(small laugh) Mrs. Graves takes Mike’s hand. Mike sees the kids walking up ahead.

Mrs. Graves’s class is met by a monster TOUR GUIDE.
Now stay close together, we're entering a very dangerous area. The field trip is entering a scare floor.
Welcome to the scare floor. The students are in awe as they see the scare floor.
(walla) Whoa!

Well hey, you’re in luck. Because I just happen to be a scarer! I learned everything I know from my school, Monsters University.

It’s the best scaring school there is. Another scarer, sneaks up behind him and takes his hat.
You wish, Fear Tech’s the best.  The MU scarer snatches his hat back, smiling.

Okay, you guys watch us and tell me which school's the best. Alright? (whispered, he surreptitiously points to his cap) MU is. Employees (Scarers, assistants, can wranglers, etc.) star stream onto the floor. The tour guide ushers Mike and the students to a viewing area. ON MIKE, studying everything on the scare floor. Not watching, he puts a foot past the line.

Oops. Stop right there. Don’t cross over that safety line, human children are extremely toxic. Mike steps back and watches all the activity, in awe. But just as the doors start to get wheeled onto the floor, th bigger kids push their way to the front, blocking Mike’s view.
(excited walla) Look at that!
Whoa - hey...guys, watch the eye! Ow! Mike pops out from the back of the crowd and falls on his butt, but pops right back up again.
(walla) Whoa! /Wow!

Excuse me, fellas. How about we do tallest in the back? Mike is desperate to see. He jumps up, ducks down, peeks between legs and sees: -a glimpse of a door being put into the door station. -a glimpse of a door’s light glowing red.  -a glimpse of a scarer warming up, snarling, etc.

(sigh)
Cool! I wanna be a scarer!

Come on guys, I wanna see!

(walla) Whoa! Cool! Mike backs away as his smile fades. Mike looks frustrated, not being able to see. Just then, cart full of scream cans comes toward Mike. He gets an id ON TEACHER. She tries to keep the kids together.
Brian, do not step over the line. One of them points to the scare floor.

(scream) Michael?! They all see Mike watching the MU scarer as he opens the to the human world and slinks inside. The door starts to close behind him. But not before Mike, moving fast, slips through the door and into the human world too! INT. HUMAN KID’S ROOM - NIGHT Inside the human kid’s room, Mike hides in the shadows as scarer starts his stealthy approach to the kid. The scare is totally unaware that Mike is in the room. Mike’s terrified, but the more he watches the scarer, the more he gets caught up in the excitement and awe of it al The scarer is about to scare when suddenly the kid’s bedr door opens and the parents peep in. Mike is hiding right behind the door, inches away from the humans! The scarer hides too, blending into the shadows.
See, I told you he’s fine.

Well, I thought I heard something. The parents close the door and the scarer re-emerges, continuing to build his scare. Mike watches the scarer scratch the end of the bed. The kid hears this and rises up in bed. The scarer slides under the side of the bed and then looms up over the kid.
ON MIKE as he watches. His mouth falls open, in awe.

The scream can fills to the top. The MU scarer steps through the door, a satisfied look on face - a solid scare. The door shuts down. And then he stops in his tracks when he realizes there a dozens of people staring at him, panicked.
What? The MU scarer steps aside, revealing Mike smiling, a daze dreamy look in his eye. Mike is swarmed by angry people - his teacher, factory employees, etc.

What were you thinking?! (walla) This is ridiculous, young man! You coulda got yourself killed, kid! Did you touch anything?! Do you know what could have happened?! Meanwhile, as the scarer who was in the room with Mike do his MU hat, someone comes over and confers with him. The scarer looks over at Mike, putting things together. As the angry walla continues, the MU scarer approaches Mi again, sternly. Mike is still in awe of everything he jus saw.
That was real dangerous, kid. I didn’t even know you were in there. Mike looks at the scarer, ashamed. And then, the scarer can’t help but smile, realizing something.
(impressed) Wow, I didn’t even know you were in there.... (laugh) Not bad, kid. He winks and slaps his MU hat on Mike, then crosses away.
Michael, what do you have to say for yourself? Mike smiles the biggest, happiest smile you’ve ever seen.
How do I become a scarer?  10. Push in to a CU of the MU logo. The eye in the “M” looks from right to left and Mike pops from behind it.

Monsters University! Anybody getting off?
A backpack and a suitcase appear in the aisle. REVEAL MIKE, beaming, brimming with excitement. He turns face everyone on the bus.  11.

(happy sigh) Well everyone, I don’t mean to get emotional but everything in my life has led to this moment. Let it not be just the beginning of my dream, but the beginning of all of our dreams. Gladys, promise me you'll keep auditioning! Marie, Mr. Right is out there somewhere! Phil, keep using the ointment until that thing goes away! I wish you all the best, thank you all so much! No response from the bus crowd.
(dead pan) I'm welling up with tears, now get off. Unphased, Mike exits the bus.
Mike leaps down the stairs and gathers his bags. He stares up in awe.... REVEAL MONSTERS UNIVERSITY: The gate, with the campus bey
Mike walks onto a campus filled with monster students of shapes and sizes. In the background, the grand, classic architecture of an Ivy League school.

Hello. How ya doing? A student on a bicycle whooshes by. Students play monster hackey sack in the quad as another student with several arms posts signs to a lamppost. A student on a skateboard whizzes by as a giant monster s over Mike and moves to catch a frisbee.
(ground shaking vocs) Ah!  12.
Woo hoo!
(excited laugh) She catches the frisbee and sends it back to her friend.
Mike walks over a bridge on a small river. He looks down sees more students, swimming into what must be an underwa section of the school. Mike checks his list:
Ok, first thing on my list... get registered! A monster in a “Smile Squad” shirt steps up to Mike.
Hey there, freshman! I’m Jay the RA, and I’m here to say that registration is that-a-way!
Okay Jay! Mike heads toward the registration area.
Have a great first day! Mike steps up to the registration table.
Hey, I’m Kay! Here’s your orientation packet!
Thanks Kay!
You can drop your bags off here and get your picture taken with Trey! Kay motions toward Trey.
Mike sits down to get his photo taken.
Say hooray!
Hooray! FLASH! Trey takes the photo. CUT TO an insert of Mike’s I card, the top of his head is the only part in the photo.
(is he upset?) I can’t believe it... (thrilled) I'm officially a college student!! He joins a freshmen tour group.
Okay everyone, I’m Fay and I'll be giving you your orientation tour on this perfect day! The TOUR GUIDE waves her flag. Mike is in awe.
The tour continues.
Here are the labs where students learn to design and build the doors to the human world. We see a door being processed.
(tour walla) Wow... A Professor swipes their I.D. and enters the work area.

The MU cafeteria serves a full buffet, three meals a day. I personally believe we have some of the best chefs in the world. We see a student dump food into a trash can. A food worke then picks up the trash can and dumps it back onto the buffet.
The campus offers a wide variety of majors but the crown jewel of MU is the scaring school.
(walla, in awe) Whoa! The tour guide leads her tour away, leaving Mike alone in of this famous building.
Mike passes by a series of tables, each one manned by students trying to interest freshmen in their respective clubs. The Debate Team.
Welcome to the debate team. We're happy to have you!

I disagree for the following reasons. True happiness is a theoretical construct....  15. Mike continues to walk by the tables and an eye appears behind him. He turns and he is eye to eye with another monster.

Hey there! Keep your eye on the sky...at the astronomy club. The Art Club. A mop-looking monster splashes pink paint over his head, covering himself. He then splatters his head on a canvas, creating “art” while another member begins to play the dr The Improv Club.

Hey, hey, hey! Come join the Improv Club! You'll wish you were a...never...always. Ah, dang it! Mike passes by with a smile - he’s not interested, but lo the variety of options, the huge world he’s entered. GREEK COUNCIL table.

Cool.

Wazowski, room three nineteen; you know your roommate is a scaring major too. Excited, Mike grabs his keys from the RA and excitedly he off toward his room.

Hello, I’m your roommate. No, that’s too bland. (exhale) Don’t force it. Just let it happen. Your lifelong best friend is right behind this door! Huh.... (squinting voc) Randy closes the door.  18. INT. MIKE AND RANDY’S DORM ROOM Mike finishes putting the last of his many scaring poster up, placing books on a shelf, along with Little Mikey and pinning up the Scare Games flyer. He then consults his checklist.
Okay, unpack - check. Hang posters - check. Now I just need to ace my classes, graduate with honors, and become the greatest scarer ever.

I got ‘em. The bookshelf comes crashing down, everything falling ont Sulley.

“To frighten a child is the point of a scare. If you frighten a TEEN then scarer beware!” Mike reaches down and grabs a stick that represents a hum kid.
Okay, scare the little kid.... Mike throws in a stick that represents a human kid.
Roar!
Avoid the teenager! Sulley ducks.
Event #3. “Don’t Scare the Teen.” Pull back on this large scale maze. A PNK sister comes around a corner.
I’m on the phone!
Roar! The red light buzzes, fail. Another PNK sister comes to another standee.
No one understands me!
Buzz, fail!
Whatever!
Buzz, fail! Eventually the whole team is trapped in the middle of the maze with nowhere to go. Art comes dashing around a corner. A teenager on a stande pops up.

But daddy I love him! Art hides around the corner and the light on the standee turns green. The standee moves out of his way and Art is able to continue down that path. Art takes off through the maze. ON SQUISHY. A young child standee pops up and Squishy immediately scares the standee.
Roar! Simulator scream, green light! Score! The RORs come out victorious.
First place, ROAR OMEGA ROAR! Second place, Oozma Kappa! But the crowd erupts when they see the Oozmas make it out before the PNKs.

Third place, HSS! ON THE SCOREBOARD. The PNKs are eliminated and the Oozma Kappas move up another notch. Fans cheer them on! Back in the maze the PNKs are still stuck. Another teenager standee pops up behind Carrie.
You're lame.  105. Carrie turns to the teenager and blows fire, charring the standee.
Oozma Kappa is gathered in the quad. Mike pulls out another black envelope and reads the messa

“Someone is coming, this could ruin your night! Stay hidden, take cover, and stay out of sight. You’ve got ten seconds, go!” Ten seconds go by and...Mike immediately points out where everyone is hiding.
Kiosk! Pile of leaves! Standing out in the open! Art is standing, staring at a butterfly.
And there should be one more.... He hears a whistle from up above.
(whistle) How'd I do?
Oh, not too shabby, Don!
Thanks! I cannot get down.
INT. MIKE AND SULLEY’S BEDROOM Mike quizzes Sulley on the different scare faces.
Zombie snarl. Sulley jets out his lower jaw like a piranha.  106.
Angry poodle. Sulley snarls his teeth like a little dog.
Jazz clown. Sulley makes a clown face.
My Aunt Phyllis. Sulley imitates his aunt.
In the morning! Sulley makes a more sullen face.
That’s what I’m talking about!
Mike teaches Don about his tentacles.
Don has a helmet on and is terrified. Sulley holds Don on his feet and launches him into the air at a wall.
Aaaaaah! (impact voc) Ha ha! He sticks! He proceeds to climb up the wall using his suction cup arms.
INT. MIKE AND SULLEY’S BEDROOM Sulley jumps down out of bed first this time.  107.

Time to go to work! Mike and Sulley both get out of bed at the same time, maneuvering around their small room without getting in ea other's way. It’s fluid as they work as a team. They both head off to class.
Event #4, “Hide and Sneak.” A crowd gathers as lights fla out of the windows of the fraternity house.

One of the RORs hides in a plant while Randy slinks up a shade, disappearing completely. A referee with several eyes sneaks around with a flashlig trying to find competitors. The flashlight lands on a curtain. It’s pulled back to reveal a HSS sorority sister The referee blows the whistle.
You're out! The referee hears a rattle and catches a one-eyed monster holding up an end table.
You're out! The light finds the fireplace where debris falls down the chute. Another HSS sister falls and lands in the soot.

Yeah, yeah, tough luck, Kris Kringle. She walks off frustrated. The referee follows and complet misses Sulley who disguises himself as a bear rug.  108. Sulley stands up and runs off. Mike turns around from ins a globe holder and we pan up and see Don attached to the ceiling with his suction cups.
The front door of the ROR house. Roar Omega Roar emerges victorious, closely followed by Oozma Kappa.
(cheering)
Thank you! The Oozma fans go nuts!
(Big cheer!)
(thrilled)
Woo! YEAH! They move ahead in the games. The three remaining teams have just finished the latest competition.
We're down to two remaining teams! Roar Omega Roar and Oozma Kappa! The Greek VP opens a black envelope and announces...

Which leads us to the final event. “Every one of your skills will be put to the test. The scare simulator will prove who's the best.” Tomorrow night you finally get to SCARE in front of the whole school! Mike smiles, thrilled. The crowd begins to break up. Johnny and the RORs pass.  109.
Enjoy the attention while it lasts, boys. After you lose, no one will remember you.
Maybe, but when you lose no one will let you forget it.
(sotto) Oh boy, that is a good point. Johnny slaps Chet and they all walk off. Mike and the Ooz smile and watch them leave. A group of fans approach.
Hey Oozmas, you guys are awesome!
You’ve gotta teach us your moves. Don points to Mike.
Well then, you're gonna wanna talk to this guy. ON Mike pleasantly surprised by the attention.
(laughing) Oh, sure I can teach you. Sulley smiles as he watches Mike enjoy his much-earned attention.
..-Alright, you wanna hide behind the chair, you have to become the chair...see, the trick to hiding is understanding your surroundings. Sulley spots Dean Hardscrabble as she walks by the VP.
Thanks for coming, Dean. Sulley follows the dean and then humbly addresses her.  110.
Dean Hardscrabble? If we get back into the scaring program, I hope there’s no hard feelings? She stops and turns to Sulley.
Tomorrow each of you must prove that you are undeniably scary. And I know for a fact, that one of you is not. Hardscrabble looks over at the team, she lands on Mike. Sulley’s eyes follow.
(effort sounds) It’s as simple as that.
No, he works harder than anyone.
Do you think he’s scary?
He’s the heart and soul of the team.

DO YOU think he’s scary? No response. Hardscrabble turns and walks away. Sulley stares after Hardscrabble as she walks off - she c be right, can she? INT. MIKE AND SULLEY’S ROOM, NIGHT ON Mike scaring. Sulley lies on his top bunk, staring at nothing.
(Roar) We’re gonna win this thing tomorrow, Sull, I can feel it! Mike sits on the edge of his bed, grabbing his hat.
We'll finally have our lives back on track.
Hey, Mike? Sulley leans over the bed to face Mike.
You know, you’ve given me a lot of really great tips. I’d love to return the favor sometime.
Oh yeah, sure. Anytime. ON Sulley clearing furniture to make room. Mike stands in the middle of the room, watching Sulley.
We're doing this now? Sulley grabs Mike’s textbook.
Okay, you've memorized every textbook, every scare theory and that is great. He tosses the book out the window.
Hey! We hear a cat squeal outside.
But now, it’s time to forget all that. Just reach deep down and “Let the Scary Out."
Huh, just feel it.
Exactly. Go wild.
(hesitant) I don’t know...I’ve kind of got my own technique. 111.
Give it a try. Mike looks at Sulley.... QUICK CUTS OF MIKE PRACTICING WITH SULLEY.
(Roar!)
Good, but bigger!
(Roar!)
Oh, you’re thinking again! From the gut!
(Roar!)
Let the animal out!
(Roar!)
Come on! Dig deep! Mike roars at Sulley.
(ROAR! )
Boys! It’s a school night! Mike and Sulley stop and look toward the disembodied voic Ms. Squibbles.
(out of breath) So, how was that? Sulley smiles and puts up his hand for a high five.
Up top. Mike high-fives him. Both guys make their way back to bed 112.  113.
Ha ha! You know, it did feel different. Sulley jumps up into his bunk.
(laughing)
I feel like it’s all coming together. Mike hops into bed. He moves his hat over and turns off t light.
Yep, this time tomorrow, the whole school is finally gonna see what Mike Wazowski can do.
You're darn right. Mike turns over and falls asleep. Sulley’s smile fades to look of concern.
Shots of the students heading to the final event of the S Games as the alma mater plays. We follow some flying monsters as they descend into the arena.
The alma mater ends.

head_text.subj: ON THE GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT AND VP

text: Welcome to the final competition of the Scare Games! The crowd cheers the two remaining teams.

head_text.subj: ON MS. SQUIBBLES AND OOZMA FANS

text: Hardscrabble appears farther away in the stadium and glan toward Oozma Kappa. Her eyes narrow.
It’s time to see how terrifying you really are in the scare simulators!
We see a simulator for each team. ON Mike, daunted but ready for the challenge. ON the Greek Council president.
(ominously) But be warned, each simulated scare has been set to the highest difficulty level! ON the misfits.
(nervous ) The HIGHEST level?!
First scarers to the starting line! A little more nervous now, Mike takes a breath and turns his team.
Okay, just like we planned... I’1l go first, then Don---
Hold on. (to the Oozmas) Mike’s the one who started all of this. And I think it’s only right if he’s the one who finishes it. I think you should go last.
Yes, yes, right on!
Alright!  115.
Yeah Mike, finish strong!
All right...Don, you okay going first?
(nervous ) I guess I’m as ready as I'll ever be. All hands in the circle-
Oooooccozma Kappa!
The games begin with Don going up against Reggie. Don loo at his competitor.
(pumping himself up) I'm gonna do it, gonna take him down.... Johnny yells from off to the side.
Hey Bruiser, you take it easy on Grandpa! Art calls from the other side.
Unleash the beast, Don! Don looks nervous, but does his best to cover.

Okay, then. A light flashes red, yellow, green. GO! They're off! Don gets to his door, pulls out a dossier an reads the info on his child. A Jumbotron shows Don enteri the room, carefully. The crowd waits with anticipation.
Don finds the room filled with toxic toys, he scratches h chin unsure how to proceed then looks at his tentacles an gets an idea.
Meanwhile, Reggie creeps into his room and steps on a squ rubber duck, accidentally. But he recovers. As the sim kid sits up, Reggie turns and scares him immediately.
The scoreboard shows Reggie’s score. Johnny is not happy.
He comes out cheering, as if he did well.
(cheering)
The sim kid sits up and we see Don on the ceiling. He swo down toward the bed, hanging by an arm.
Reggie sees Don’s scare register on the board, and eclips his by a small percent. The Oozmas are thrilled!  117.
Huh? ON Don stepping out of the simulator with new found confidence. He looks to Reggie and the RORs.
(confident) Thanks for taking it easy on grampa. Reggie and the RORs are a little shocked. ON SIMULATOR as two referees finish rearranging the toys the room, they give the thumbs up when it’s ready.
Next group to the starting line!
LET’S DO THIS! Green light turns on, GO! Terri and Terry take off against Chet from the RORs.
Chet dances his claws around the toys to the bed and lets a fearsome roar.
(roar)
The score board shows Chet taking the lead over the OKs. RORs cheer at Chet’s score.
(cheering)

A door opens and in walks the silhouette of a human. But then the human splits apart into a four-armed, two-headed creature and lunges into the foreground revealing Terri a Terry, roaring. The kid screams.
(roar) On score board showing this scare taking the OKs just bel the RORs’ lead.
(cheers )

A sim kid lies quietly in bed when the closet door opens. that Squishy in front of the door? The kid’s eyes scan th room and go back to the door, Squishy’s gone. A second later, the kid turns and Squishy is suddenly rig beside him. The sim kid screams and Squishy’s scream can fills up jus over half way. Score board shows Oozmas have taken a small lead! Squishy’s mom cheers wildly.
(Cheer! )
ON ROR sim kid as Chip does a terrifying scare.
ON Scoreboard as the RORs reach past the Oozmas. ON Mike and the team watching dejected. But they rally.  119.
(pumping him up) Come on Art, you can do it!/Come on buddy!

Art comes in, taking large steps across the room then balancing on his hands. It’s a mixture of break-dancing a yoga. He flattens and rolls under the bed. A four-armed bug monster from the ROR team let's loose hi scare. ON scoreboard as the bug guy creates an even bigger lead.
(cheering) Yes! ON sim kid. Art appears at the kid’s side and strikes a strange yoga pose.

(warbled) Roar! Art’s scream can only fills up halfway. Not enough points pull up to the RORs. ON MIKE, disappointed. It’s not looking good for the Oozm the RORs have too big a lead. But they rally anyway.

Next up, Sullivan and Boggs! Randy and Sulley take their places at the starting line. The light turns and they're off! Sulley stops at the door, opens his dossier. ON the dossier. “7-year-old, lives on Kauai and is afraid thunder and lions.” Mike watches as Sulley studies the information.  120.
(sotto) You got this, Sull.
Sulley heads inside. He carefully dodges every obstacle a positions himself at the end of the bed.
Mike and the misfits watch Sulley on the Jumbotron.
Randy disappears into his room, climbing the walls.
Sulley slowly lurches up over the kid and does a big roar

The room shakes and the sim kid screams. ON RANDY, as his simulator shakes from Sulley’s roar. Randy drops to the ground and is thrown off his game. He blends into a heart rug this time and lets out a meager r
(lame)
ON SCOREBOARD showing the scores are now tied!
And it’s all tied up! Sulley joins his team as they celebrate. They’re almost there.
Oh, tough break for the RORs! Randy sees them celebrating as he backs up and runs right into Johnny.
Huh? Johnny is fuming.
Hearts?!! Johnny stares daggers at Randy.
Way to go, Boggs! Randy looks back at Oozma Kappa celebrating.
(to himself) That's the last time I lose to you, Sullivan.
Worthington and Wazowski to the starting line! All eyes on Mike. Mike pauses, a bit of doubt setting in. He looks over and sees Hardscrabble looking in his direction. Sulley approaches Mike.
Hey. Don't worry about Hardscrabble, don't worry about anyone else. Just go out there and show ‘em what Mike Wazowski can do. Mike’s nervousness fades when he hears this.  122.
Thanks. Mike heads to the starting line. He’s right next to Johnn

Don’t take the loss too hard. You never belonged here anyway. Mike’s eye narrows. For the first time he looks determine The light turns and they're off! Mike and Johnny are neck and neck. They enter their simulators. INTERCUT as they both approach the sim kid. Johnny creeps toward the bed. Mike takes his time, dodging toys and distracting the kid with a scratch to the bed. Johnny goes in for the kill.
ON SCOREBOARD Johnny almost fills his can, taking the tea lead close to the top.
Amazing performance by Worthington! We see Johnny walking out like a champion.
(chanting)
Johnny, you’re my hero!

The Oozmas will need a record breaking scare to win this! ON SULLEY, anxiously waiting on Mike's scare. Mike crouches by the bed, contemplating his next move. Ev discouraging statement floating through his mind.... MEAN KID O.S. You don’t belong on a scare floor.  123. JOHNNY O.S. No one will remember you. HARDSCRABBLE O.S. You're not scary. And then Sulley...
Come on, dig deep! Mike’s eye opens and he leaps up over the bed and ROARS!
The can fills to the top! Oozma Kappa’s point tally beats the ROR house! Everyone g wild.
(Huge Cheer!) ON HARDSCRABBLE in the audience, stunned.

They did it! YEAHHHHHHH!! She grabs the VP and pushes him over as she cheers wildly The crowd rushes the stadium, flying by the stunned ROR brothers. Mike steps from the simulator, stunned as he realizes wha has happened. The Oozma Kappas run to Mike, hoisting him on to their shoulders.
YEAH!! We're in the scare program! The Oozma Kappas are celebrating, hugging each other. Don cheers on Squishy.
You son of gun! Way to go!  124. Ms. Squibbles is cheering too. Don turns and unknowingly hugs her.
Oh yeah!! Surprised, they pull back but his tentacles get stuck....
(stuck efforts) Oh, little stuck...
(embarrassed vocs) Oh...
Pardon me, there, Ms. Squibbles. They both felt something, and they study each other intensely, as if for the first time....
It’s Sheri... Awkward but sweet moment. ON THE OOZMAs as we pull out....
The brothers of Oozma Kappa shake hands with fans and fin soaking up the moment.
Way to go, Oozma Kappa!
Thank you/Thanks a lot.
You rule!
I have never ruled before.  125. Squishy holds the trophy, admiring it.
(laughing) You guys killed it out there....
(laughing) Awesome. Sulley laughs as he looks for Mike.
(calling out) Hey Wazowski! Come on, let’s go, you maniac! We’re celebrating! Sulley finds Mike standing alone in the Oozma’s simulator
Mike? Mike is beaming, lost in his own little world.
I did it. I can’t believe it. Sulley smiles.... Mike turns around.
I’m gonna be a scarer!
(laughing) Yeah, yes, you are! Mike turns to the sim kid one more time.

Hey, you hear that? Get plenty of rest kidd-o....You haven’t seen the last of Mike Wazowski. BOO! Mike playfully throws his hands in the air toward the sim --to his shock the sim kid shoots out of bed and lets out terrifying scream, reacting just as wildly as it did in t competition. Mike leaps back in shock. Mike turns to see the can fill all the way to the top.  126. Sulley says nothing, he looks confused, slightly worried.
I knew I was scary, I didn’t know I was that scary.... Mike chuckles awkwardly, clearly confused.

(covering) Yeah, we’re so scary, I guess we broke it. C’mon. But Mike approaches the bed slowly, his smile fading. Mik leans in and snaps his fingers right by the sim kid’s hea The dummy shoots back into the air and screams. Confused, Mike lifts the bed skirt to reveal a control pa We see a row of six gauges with a row down labeled “Easy, “Medium,” and “Hard.”
It’s been tampered with.
Uh, I don’t think you should be messing with that.
Why are my settings...different? Suddenly it dawns on Mike.
Mike, we should leave. Mike looks at Sulley. Sulley looks cornered. Suddenly it dawns on Mike.
Did you do this?
Mike.
DID YOU do this? Sulley struggles then...
(ashamed) I...yes, I did, but you don’t understand--
Why?! Why did you do this? Mike’s face drops, his heart breaks.
(sigh) You know, just in case...
In case of what? Sulley lifts his head and looks at Mike. Suddenly dawns on Mike.
You don’t think I’m scary.
Mike...
(hurt) You said you believed in me.... (then, angry) But you’re just like Hardscrabble. You're just like everyone else.
Look, you'll get better and better-
I’m as scary as you! I’m as scary as anyone!
I just wanted to help.
No, you just wanted to help yourself!

Well, what was I supposed to do? Let the whole team fail because you don’t have it?! 127. it all And just like that, Sulley’s said it. And Mike is thrown a second. Then his eye narrows, and he storms off. As he does, REVEAL the misfits, who are standing just off stage. They saw the whole thing, and they look hurt/confu /disappointed/angry.  128. While the others walk away, Squishy sets down the trophy shuffles off with them.... ON SULLEY as he tries to process how totally wrong everything's gone. In what was supposed to be a triumphan moment, he’s alone - confused, angry, frustrated....
Two door lab students walk by and reveal Mike leaning up against a wall across from the door tech lab.
So your calculations were a little off.
That door took me ALL semester.
It’s too dangerous, the professor's just gonna shred it.
Sulley walks across campus, still confused, upset. Holdin the trophy limply. As he passes students...

There he is! The big guy!/The first of many trophies.... If this is everything Sulley wanted... he’s too out of it notice. He just moves past the students, numb, and glance at his sad reflection in the trophy.

Sullivan! Sulley looks up from the trophy to see Professor Knight. PROFESSOR KNIGHT (CONT’D) Nice work out there. I look forward to having you back in class. Sulley looks conflicted as Knight heads to the School of Scaring.  129.
Hey, there he is! REVEAL JOHNNY and the RORs, who walk up.
Looks like I was wrong about you. You're one of us after all.... He holds out a ROR jacket for Sulley.
Way to go, Sulley. Welcome back Broham! You are one of us now, okay? So anytime you wanna come hang out and do whatever, you got a Crew....
(walla) Yeah!/You’re a ROR/Sullivan!

You’re a ROR, buddy! Sulley looks at Johnny, then past him... he sees Knight talking to Dean Hardscrabble, at the entrance to the Scho of Scaring. A look of resolve comes over Sulley’s face - he knows wha has to do. He hands the jacket AND the trophy to Johnny and runs off
(flustered) Hey! Where are you going-?

Mike stares at the door lab. Several students shut off th light and come out of the lab. Mike casually walks by them, grabbing one of their card k Glancing around, he swipes the card. He waits for the gre light and opens the door, heading in.
Sulley is in mid-confession to Hardscrabble and Knight.  130.
You did what?
My team had nothing to do with it, it was all me...I cheated. Hardscrabble and Knight are stunned.
I expect you off campus by tomorrow. Sulley hangs his head accepting his fate.
(sotto) Yes ma‘am.
You're a disgrace to this University...and your family name. Sulley is crushed. Suddenly, an alarm sounds on campus. A security guard is running by....
What’s going on?
Someone broke into the door lab!
(sotto) What?! Hardscrabble flies off immediately.... Sulley watches her fly towards the door tech building. It dawns on Sulley...Mike.
Oh no...

Mike places a scream can in its station. He takes off his and places it on a scream can as he faces off with the do  131. He powers up the door. In the background, we hear security guards trying to get Mike has blocked the door with a cart full of scream cans

(walla) Open the door!/Don’t go in there!/It’s very dangerous! He stands there, unflinching in front of the door. The li turns on above the door and Mike turns the knob. INT. BEDROOM —- NIGHT In the human world, a closet door opens. Mike steps throu it and quietly shuts the door. He’s in the human world!
(big exhale) He makes his silent, stealthy approach towards the bed, building a scary mood. The kid slowly sits up, sensing something.... Suddenly Mike leaps up and ROARS.
(gasp) The kid stares at Mike. Mike roars again.
Then the kid smiles.
You look funny. ON MIKE, as he reacts, confused/disappointed/upset.

(confused) What? Mike hears a COUGH offscreen.  132. The camera pulls out to reveal he’s in a cabin full of be a kid bunked down in each one. A banner hangs on the wall reading, “Camp Teamwork.” The other kids start to wake up. Groggily, they stare at Mike.

(waking up walla) What’s going on?/It’s the middle of the night./He’s a little funny green guy.... Mike is thrown - what should he do? He takes a step back toward the closet door when he turns next to the closet is another kid. He freezes. A beat.
(playful, back at Mike)
Mike gasps in disbelief. The other kids in the cabin start to get closer. He's trapped!
(walla) What is that?/Hey, I was sleeping./I wanna touch it./He’s so cute!
Sulley runs through the hall and up to the door lab, wher crowd of students is being held back by campus security.
James!

No one goes near that door until the authorities arrive.  133. Sulley moves to the front of the crowd near the misfits. Inside the lab, Hardscrabble oversees additional security personnel who are securing the door and investigating the scene.
You don’t think that could be-
It’s Mike.
But he could die out there! Sulley tears down the “Caution Do Not Cross” tape.
James, wait! We can help. Don steps forward.
Leave it to the old, “Master of Sales.” ON Hardscrabble and the guards. They are talking in the d tech lab when Don confidently strolls up to them.
We've got a call in, but that’s the best we can do--- Don taps one of them on the shoulder and they turn around bewildered to see someone has crossed into the lab.
Ahem. (turning on the charm) Don Carton, sales. Folks, today is your lucky day, how many times have you asked yourself the following question-- Hardscrabble stares at Don, not buying it.
(dismissive) Arrest him. Suddenly, two guards throttle Don against the wall.  134.
Pardon? (impact) Ahhh!
Spread ‘em, Pops!
Do you mind?!
Don’t move! Sulley runs for the door. When Sulley’s almost to the door, Hardscrabble spots him of the corner of her eye.
What? Sullivan! Don't you dare! He grabs the door handle....
Sullivan, don’t go in there! Sulley quickly looks back toward Hardscrabble, ignores he and slips through the door.
Sulley creeps through the cabin, which is empty. Where is Mike?

(whisper) Mike? Mike? Sulley hears voices outside and crosses to a window. Some camp counselors are gathered in front of one of the kids’ cabins, relating the events of the night to some park rangers. The flashing lights of the ranger’s cruiser stro through the cabin.
The kids are saying they saw something in the cabin.
They're calling it an alien.  135.
It was!
I saw a little green guy! Sulley hears a noise and looks over to see a broken scree He goes to the screen and whispers outside....
(whispered) Mike? He climbs out the window.
Sulley jumps down from the window. A couple of rangers hear him and train their flashlights him.
(gasp) Ah!

Bear! A bear in the camp! Sulley takes off running, jumping down into a gully, evad the lights. Sulley sprints through the woods. He bursts through some brush and comes to the edge of a lake. He scans the lake but hears men yelling and ducks behind rack of canoes, seeing flashlights in the distance.
(walla) Down there, everybody over here...I heard something over here. Sulley hears a splash and turns to see Mike sitting at th foot of the lake, staring at his reflection in the water.
(gasp then sigh of relief) Mike! Mike doesn’t look back.  136.
C’mon buddy, let’s get you out of here. Mike still doesn’t look up.
This is all my fault...I’m sorry--- Mike continues to look down.
(depressed) You were right, they weren’t scared of me. Sulley moves closer and looks down at Mike, silent.
I did everything right. I wanted it more than anyone. And I thought, I thought if I wanted it enough, I could show everybody that... Mike stares at his reflection in the water.
That Mike Wazowski is something special, and I’m just...not. He splashes it away.
Look Mike, I know how you feel---
Don’t do that. Please don’t do that. You DO NOT know how I feel. Mike’s raises his voice, Sulley looks around cautiously.
Mike, calm down.
Monsters like you have everything. You don’t have to be good, you can mess up over and over again, and the whole world loves you.
Mike-  137.
You’1l never know what it’s like to fail, because you were born a Sullivan!

Yeah, I’m a Sullivan! I’m the Sullivan who flunked every test, the one who got kicked out of the program. The one who was so afraid to let everyone down, that I cheated, and I lied. (sigh) Mike, I‘11 never know how you feel, but you’re not the only failure here. Sulley’s shoulders drop, he sits down next to Mike.
I act scary Mike, but most of the time...I’m terrified.
How come you never told me that before?

Because...we weren’t friends before. Mike is stunned, at a loss for words. Suddenly a flashlight grazes Sulley. Sulley jumps back as the lights come toward him. Mike hides behind a rock as he watches Sulley driven away Mike is in shock. Sulley looks back at Mike, they both do know what to do. After a second, Sulley just takes off running.

(walla) Over there... Sulley runs through the darkness and right into an EMBANKMENT. He tries to climb the slippery side of the embankment but flashlights are getting closer.  138. Just as he is struggling, a tree limb is suddenly lowered down next to him.

Sulley. Sulley looks up - it’s Mike, at the top of the embankment Sulley’s surprised.... In the distance, the sound of humans is getting closer, a we can make out flashlights in the trees. Mike lowers the tree branch a little more, bracing his fe against some rocks. He pulls Sulley up over the edge. They take off back towa the cabin.
The rangers are surrounding the cabin. Mike and Sulley see an opening and sprint toward the cabi
The guys burst into the cabin, run to the closet door and throw it open! REVEAL: Just a closet full of camping supplies. No monste world. ON MIKE AND SULLEY, who react, dismayed.
No...
The door powers down. The door lab is crawling with campus security. Dean Hardscrabble stands beside the door station, a finger on power button. Oozma Kappa is being held back by security.
They're still in there!  139.
Until the authorities arrive, this door stays off. The misfits react. Hardscrabble has just delivered a deat sentence.
NO! You can’t do that! Squishy breaks the line, tearfully charging for his frien but he’s held back with ease by security.
Enough! I want this room cleared, now! Security starts herding students out of the lab.
